Name: OT8-RF (8x Telescopic)
Description:
Manufacturer: Gemini 
Type: Telescopic
Attachment Point: Optic   
Magnification: 8x
Size: 3

Combining a premium 8x telescopic sight with Gemini's innovative echoburst rangefinder, the OT8-RF model allows you to accurately gauge the distance to your target; vital for effective precision shooting. The standard scope for Gemni's A03 Sniper Rifle, the OT8-RF is engineered to impress in a variety of situations and engagements.
